title: Was Michel Foucault an Aspie? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you think it’s important? He was a guy who knew what wanted, was a focused worker and had a kind of ‘vision’. And… he was clever. By the way I don’t think that it i helpful to use words like ‘Aspie’ to define people. I don’t think that it would help if you thought him being gay would amount to grasp him or his work.
